title: ASIC expected to sue Commonwealth Bank's insurance unit - paper
text:
ASIC expected to sue Commonwealth Bank's insurance unit - paper

Stock Markets 33 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 10:50)

© Reuters. ASIC expected to sue Commonwealth Bank's insurance unit - paper SYDNEY, Oct 4 (Reuters) - The Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC) is expected to announce legal action against the Commonwealth Bank of Australia's life insurance arm over wrongdoing aired at an inquiry, the Australian newspaper reported on Friday. The unit, CommInsure, was criticised last year at the inquiry on financial sector misconduct after it was shown to have rejected a trauma payout to a heart attack victim because it was using outdated assessment criteria. agreed to sell its life-insurance business to Hong-Kong based AIA Group in September 2017. A prolonged regulatory approval processes, however, led to the deal's reworking in August.
